Text:
WTF rar files. Just put the original movie file. What's ur scam here?

Where are the technical data for each movies? I mean source? runtime? resolution? aspect ratio? fps? video codec? container? video bitrate? audio codec? audio channel? audio bitrate? sampling rate? languages?

for example:

A Nightmare on Elm street 2 1985 Freddys Revenge:

Storyline: A teenage boy is haunted in his dreams by Freddy Krueger who is out to possess him to continue his murdering in the real world.

More movie info: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0089686/

Genre.....: Horror | Mystery
Actors....: Robert Englund, Mark Patton and Kim Myers
Source....: Blu-ray 1080p
Container.: Mp4
Video.....: AVC x264 1280x720 2100kbps 23.976fs
Audio.....: English 448kbps 48khZ 16bits 6channel AC-3
Runtime...: 01:25:37
Filesize..: 1.50GB
Subtitle..: English (.srt file)

What is it? Otherwise this is very doubtful, uncertain, questionable, shady, dubious?
